alert.note: Alert for Lake of the Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:32AM CDT until July 18 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Roseau County in northwestern Minnesota... West central Lake of the Woods County in north central Minnesota... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 532 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pinecreek, or 9 miles northwest of Roseau, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Roseau around 545 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Salol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
